sentences.en: Don't mop your face after make - up .
Fetch a cloth to mop up the spill.
sentences.cn: 拿块抹布把溢出来的东西擦掉.

sentences.en: he aims to mop up corruption.
He was long-limbed and dark-eyed, with a mop of tight, dark curls.
sentences.cn: 他四肢修长、眼睛乌黑发亮，留着一头蓬乱浓密的黑色卷发。

sentences.en: Herbie took out a silk handkerchief to mop his perspiring forehead.
sentences.cn: 赫比掏出丝手帕擦去额上直淌的汗水.

sentences.en: I must mop up the last of the work.
sentences.cn: 我必须把最后这部分工作做完.

sentences.en: I used a mop to sop up the spilled water.
sentences.cn: 我用拖把把泼出的水擦干.

sentences.en: It was so hot he had to keep stopping to mop his face.
sentences.cn: 天气太热，他只得不时停下来擦一擦脸。

sentences.en: She carried on mopping the floor.
She has to mop the kitchen floor at least once a day.
sentences.cn: 她至少每天擦一次厨房的地板.

sentences.en: The hotel cleaner entered carrying a bucket and a mop.
sentences.cn: 旅馆清洁工拿着水桶和拖把进来.

sentences.en: The houseboy comes to mop our kitchen floor twice a week.
sentences.cn: 男仆每周两次到我家来拖洗厨房地板.

sentences.en: The old man wiped the floor with a mop.
sentences.cn: 那老人用拖把擦拭地板.

sentences.en: Three of us sweep and mop the floor and the remainder clean the window.
sentences.cn: 我们之中三人扫地拖地板,其余的人擦玻璃.

sentences.en: We must mop up the arrears of work.
sentences.cn: 我们必须把耽误的工作做完.

sentences.en: When the washing machine spurts out water at least we can mop it up.
sentences.cn: 洗衣机冒出水来时，我们至少可以把水擦干。

sentences.en: You have quite a mop of hair.

words.tran_cn: 用拖把擦洗地板；扮鬼脸

phrases.tran_cn: 【非正式用语】 执行不重要的任务，包括一个项目或一次活动

trans.tran_en: a thing used for washing floors, consisting of a long stick with threads of thick string or a piece of  sponge  fastened to one end
to wash a floor with a wet mop

trans.tran_cn: 用拖把拖，擦拭，搭拉着脸
